snippet.title: Guardians: Agents of Justice  - Game Teaser (1996, unreleased)
snippet.description:
Guardians: Agents of Justice, official reveal teaser.
Developed by SimTex
Publisher : Microprose
Planned release : 1996, then delayed to September 1997
System : PC (DOS and Windows)
1st working title : Agents of Justice, renamed as  Guardians: Agents of Justice in early 1997.
Development was stopped in 1997 when SimTex studio closed.

Trailer found on the covermount CD from french magazine PC-Team (issue #15, July 1996)
